segments.text: Hello , Mr . Brown . How are you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m very well , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s good to hear . Shall we get started ? I see from your application form that you ’ Ve worked as a maintenance man for over 7 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , that ’ s true .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of work did you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I fixed many kinds of machine tools such as milling machines , grinders , welders , etc . I also repaired other things such as vacuums , toilets , locks , etc . I also did some electrical work . I took some courses about electrical systems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s good . What kind of electrical work did you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took care of commercial and residential coolers and heaters . I fixed many kinds of power failure problems . Some co-workers and I even rewired part of a building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , your work experience sounds good for the job we have open . Now tell me about the best job you ’ Ve ever had , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the best job ? What do you mean ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: like the job you feel the most proud of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think my favorite job so far was when I worked for Linaria . It was hard work but the people on my job crew were great to work with . We really worked as a team . I enjoy working with those people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me something about a time when you did something well , something you feel proud of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I fixed a big problem with a machine and saved a lot of money for the factory . I got bonus for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s great . No wonder you feel proud of that . Now let me ask you another question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go ahead , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: in all the jobs you ’ Ve had , what was it you disliked the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: wow , this question is hard to answer . I don ’ t think I ’ Ve ever had a job that I really disliked . But I dislike work that is monotonous , always the same from day to day . I like to move around and do different things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: all right . Do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no . I can ’ t think of any right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you ’ ll hear from us by the end of this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thank you very much . I ’ m looking forward to hearing from you about this job .
segments.speaker: S2
